page.title: 01GENERAL RESUME OF BLOCK
page.content: This rural area is sparsely populated,containing five hamlets - Walton, Poynton Green, Great Wytheford, Little Wytheford and Osbaston. Farms of various sizes, adjoined by farm cottage, which have been modernised over the years, are scattered over it, together with some private dwellings. It is predominantley level farmland with the fields separated by traditional hedgerows. A small river _ The Roden - meanders peacefully through it, fed by brooks and clay drains. There are a few small woods and coppices - dominantly deciduous - which are allowed to remain to encourage wild life to breed.
